chargeHist.descr: 1st Degree Child Sexual Assault - Intercourse with Person under 12
1st Degree Child Sexual Assault - Intercourse with Person under 12

result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew J Otis Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $290.60 fine/cost to be paid to Probation while on Probation.
$250.00 DNA surcharge to be paid to Probation while on Probation.
Subject to Work Release.  NOT subject to Good Time.
Must complete HSED or GED while on Probation.
May not possess or use firearms or body armor.
Must comply with psychosexual evaluation & Sex Offender treatment.

NO contact with M.J.W.
NO unsupervised contact with anyone under the age of 18 unless permitted by Probation agent.  
May not vote or hold public office until civil rights are restored.  Other civil rights may be lost until restored.  
If not a U.S. Citizen, may face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.

Must provide DNA sample.
Must complete Sex Offender therapy during incarceration, if available.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Andrew J Otis Jr

Count 1-
WSP-17 yrs, 7 yr IC, 10 yr ES - I&S.  Probation 15 yrs.  1 yr CT, subj to WR no GT.  Must report today.  SO therapy if availble during incarceration.  NC w/ MJW.  No unsupervised contact with anyone under the age of 18 unless ok'd by probation agent.  Order lifetime SO registry.  $290.60, DNA sample, $250 surcharge.  Order complete GED or HSED.  Comply w/ psychosexual eval & SO txt.  
No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, other civil rights may be lost until restored, no body armor, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights.  PCR.  4:30 pm adj.
